statements: SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, sport FROM athletes WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY sport DESC
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Soccer'
SELECT name, age, retirement_date FROM athletes WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 25
SELECT id, name, sport FROM athletes WHERE retirement_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT name, age, sport FROM athletes WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Basketball' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT id, name, retirement_date FROM athletes WHERE retirement_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY retirement_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sport FROM athletes ORDER BY sport
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE sport IN ('Tennis','Soccer') AND age < 30
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Soccer';
SELECT * FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, retirement_date FROM athletes WHERE retirement_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_name, retire_reason FROM athletes JOIN retired_athletes ON athletes.athlete_id = retired_athletes.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Soccer';
SELECT athlete_name, sport, retirement_date FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Basketball' ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;

SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, sport, retirement_date FROM athletes JOIN retired_athletes ON athletes.athlete_id = retired_athletes.athlete_id WHERE retire_reason = 'Injury' ORDER BY retirement_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, sport, retirement_date FROM athletes WHERE retirement_date IS NOT NULL AND sport IN ('Tennis', 'Swimming') ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes JOIN retired_athletes ON athletes.athlete_id = retired_athletes.athlete_id WHERE retire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, sport_type FROM Athletes WHERE retirement_date IS NULL;
SELECT coach_name, hire_date FROM Coaches ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, sport_type, retirement_date FROM Athletes WHERE sport_type = 'Swimming';
SELECT athlete_name, record_type, record_date FROM Athletes JOIN Records ON Athletes.athlete_id = Records.athlete_id ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE sport_type = 'Running';
SELECT athlete_name, retirement_date FROM Athletes WHERE retirement_date < '2000-01-01';
SELECT coach_name, hire_date FROM Coaches ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, record_date FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Records ON Athletes.athlete_id = Records.athlete_id WHERE record_type = 'Marathon' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE retirement_date IS NULL;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, established_date FROM teams WHERE sport = 'Football';
SELECT athlete_name, record_value, record_date FROM athletes INNER JOIN records ON athletes.athlete_id = records.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE retirement_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY retirement_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM records GROUP BY athlete_id ORDER BY number_of_records DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(athlete_id) AS total_athletes FROM teams_athletes INNER JOIN teams ON teams_athletes.team_id = teams.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_athletes > 1;

SELECT athletes.athlete_name, teams.team_name FROM athletes INNER JOIN teams_athletes ON athletes.athlete_id = teams_athletes.athlete_id INNER JOIN teams ON teams_athletes.team_id = teams.team_id WHERE athletes.sport = 'Basketball';
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, age, retired FROM Athletes;
SELECT * FROM Teams WHERE sport = 'Football' ORDER BY established_year DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name FROM Athletes WHERE age > 30 AND retired = TRUE;
SELECT team_name, coach_id FROM Teams WHERE established_year < 2000 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, athlete_id, sport, record_type, record_date FROM Records WHERE record_type = 'Personal Best';
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Athletes WHERE retired = true;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name FROM Athletes WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Teams WHERE established_year < 2010 ORDER BY established_year ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM Records GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 2;
